category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_save_analysis_option
preference.preference_description: Defines whether the CATAnalysisComputations files or the CATAnalysisResults files are saved in the Database during the save process. (Simple value, case insensitive) both = Save both CATAnalysisComputations and CATAnalysisResults files. analysisCompute = Only Save CATAnalysisComputations file. analysisResult = Only Save CATAnalysisResults file. none = Do not Save CATAnalysisComputations files nor CATAnalysisResults files.
